titles.title: Requiring the President to take retaliatory action against foreign barriers and restrictions that unfairly limit United States trade.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Requires the President, if a foreign nation is applying a tariff or non-tariff barrier that is unduly burdening and restricting U.S. foreign trade, to: (1) apply a barrier similar in kind to that applied by the foreign nation and applicable to a similar product or service; and (2) take equivalent retaliatory action that affects goods or services, or both, of the foreign country.
